allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add test infrastructure and fix level values per documentation

- Create seed-test.ts with comprehensive test data (users, quotas, queue entries)
- Add TESTES.md with complete testing guide and scenarios
- Create centralized level constants (src/constants/levels.ts) per 7iATLAS documentation
- Fix level values across all components (correct progression: $10, $20, $40... $5120)
- Fix QuotaList component to handle API response format (object grouped by level)
- Fix settings page to use PATCH method for profile updates
- Redesign Matrix page with improved UX showing user positions prominently
- Add cashBalance to queue.service.ts LevelStatsData interface
- Fix dashboard page quota handling

Level values per documentation:
- Entry: $10, $20, $40, $80, $160, $320, $640, $1280, $2560, $5120
- Reward: 2x entry value
- Bonus: 40% of position 5 value
